name: Lonely Wooden Puppets
description:
TRIGGER WARNING: The game treats sensitive topics such as suicidal thoughts, torture or domestic violence. Viewer discretion is advised.

To know: If the game sounds do not work (music starts in the forest), restart the game. This bug appears from time to time.

"It seems that there is nothing left for me to do here in this world. Perhaps I should just let it go...." 

These were the last words you said before being brought into a mysterious forest. How did you get there? Are you hallucinating? All of this seems far too real, quick, find a way out! But it seems that there is someone or rather...Something that tries to guide you through the endless forest. Should you follow it? 

You have nothing left to lose so how about following the mysterious sounds guiding you? The mysterious thing brought you to a rather old looking village. What is this place? Who brought you here?

Discover the story of the lonely wooden puppet family by exploring the place. Who were these people and why does this village exist? Come and find out for yourself.

But do not let Him catch you.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a Bachelor project I did for my university. Everything in this game has been done exclusively by me. I am absolutely no game programmer and, environment art isn't my forte. But I do hope you enjoy the game! 

Future chapters will be uploaded since I truly want this project to be completed!
